content: श्रवणः, --णं [शृणोत्यनेन श्रु-करणे ल्युट्] {@--1@} The ear. ध्वनति मधुपसमूहे श्रवणमपिदधाति <ls>Gīt. 5.</ls> {@--2@} The hypothenuse of a triangle. --णः --णा <ab>N.</ab> of a lunar mansion containing three stars. --णं {@--1@} The act of hearing; श्रवणसुभगं <ls>Me. 11.</ls> {@--2@} Study. {@--3@} Fame, glory. {@--4@} That which is heard or revealed, the Veda; इति श्रबणात् ‘because of such a Vedic text’. {@--5@} Wealth. {@--6@} Flowing, oozing.

श्रवणः, --णं [शृणोत्यनेन श्रु-करणे ल्युट्] {@--1@} The ear. ध्वनति मधुपसमूहे श्रवणमपिदधाति <ls>Gīt. 5.</ls> {@--2@} The hypothenuse of a triangle. --णः --णा <ab>N.</ab> of a lunar mansion containing three stars. --णं {@--1@} The act of hearing; श्रवणसुभगं <ls>Me. 11.</ls> {@--2@} Study. {@--3@} Fame, glory. {@--4@} That which is heard or revealed, the Veda; इति श्रबणात् ‘because of such a Vedic text’. {@--5@} Wealth. {@--6@} Flowing, oozing.
